org.apache.drill.exec.store

Class AbstractStoragePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.store.AbstractStoragePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, SchemaFactory, StoragePlugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSystemPlugin, HBaseStoragePlugin, HiveStoragePlugin, InfoSchemaStoragePlugin, JdbcStoragePlugin, KafkaStoragePlugin, KuduStoragePlugin, MockStorageEngine, MongoStoragePlugin, OpenTSDBStoragePlugin, SystemTablePlugin

    public abstract class AbstractStoragePlugin
extends Object
implements StoragePlugin
    Abstract class for StorePlugin implementations. See StoragePlugin for description of the interface intent and its methods.

      • getOptimizerRules

        @Deprecated
public Set<? extends org.apache.calcite.plan.RelOptRule> getOptimizerRules(OptimizerRulesContext optimizerContext)
        Deprecated. Marking for deprecation in next major version release. Use getOptimizerRules(org.apache.drill.exec.ops.OptimizerRulesContext, org.apache.drill.exec.planner.PlannerPhase)
        Description copied from interface: StoragePlugin
        An implementation of this method will return one or more specialized rules that Drill query optimizer can leverage in physical space. Otherwise, it should return an empty set.
        Specified by:
        getOptimizerRules in interface StoragePlugin
        Returns:
        an empty set or a set of plugin specific physical optimizer rules.
